D

DebugIntegrator - Class in rt.integrators
Use this integrator for debugging purposes.
DebugIntegrator(Scene) - Constructor for class rt.integrators.DebugIntegrator
 
DebugIntegratorFactory - Class in rt.integrators
Makes a DebugIntegrator.
DebugIntegratorFactory() - Constructor for class rt.integrators.DebugIntegratorFactory
 
Diffuse - Class in rt.materials
A basic diffuse material.
Diffuse(Spectrum) - Constructor for class rt.materials.Diffuse
Note that the parameter value is the diffuse reflectance, which should be in the range [0,1], a value of 1 meaning all light is reflected (diffusely), and none is absorbed.
Diffuse() - Constructor for class rt.materials.Diffuse
Default diffuse material with reflectance (1,1,1).
direction - Variable in class rt.Ray
 
dist2(Vector3f, Vector3f) - Static method in class rt.StaticVecmath
 
Dodecahedron - Class in rt.basicscenes
Ray traces a simple scene.
Dodecahedron() - Constructor for class rt.basicscenes.Dodecahedron
 
DummyCamera - Class in rt.cameras
A camera whose rays have x- and y- coordinates in the direction vector in the range [0,1] over the image plane.
DummyCamera(int, int) - Constructor for class rt.cameras.DummyCamera
